title: Darcula Adds GenAI to Phishing Toolkit, Lowering the Barrier for Cybercriminals
description: The threat actors behind the Darcula phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) platform have released new updates to their cybercrime suite with generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) capabilities. "This addition lowers the technical barrier for creating phishing pages, enabling less tech-savvy criminals to deploy customized scams in minutes," Netcraft said in a new report shared with The Hacker News. "
